name.ja: <ruby>竜輝巧<rt>ドライトロン</rt></ruby>－<ruby>ν<rt>ニュー</rt></ruby><ruby>Ⅱ<rt>ツー</rt></ruby>

text.en: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned by card effect. If a "Drytron" card is on the field: You can Special Summon this card from your hand or GY, but banish it when it leaves the field. If this card is Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Drytron" monster from your Deck to your hand, except "Drytron Nu2". You can only use each effect of "Drytron Nu2" once per turn. You cannot Ritual Summon the turn you activate either of this card's effects, except Machine monsters.
